name: Fruit Maze Simulator
description:
Fruit Maze Simulator is a game created in the style of old children's computer games. In the game, your task will be to collect apples to complete the level. Gradually, obstacles will be added that can be destroyed with a certain tool.  But something is going wrong... Features:
  • A variety of tools for interacting with the environment;
  • An unexpected ending;
  • Retro grafic
